overview: Jim is a 30-year Information Technology expert with a background in online financial services transaction processing, operations and software development of business solutions. Before joining Capital Confirmation, Jim was Senior Vice President of Information Technology for MyTravel North America where he was responsible for the company’s IT strategy. He successfully managed all software development and operations that delivered applications to MyTravel’s call centers, remote agents and commercial e-commerce websites. Prior to MyTravel, Jim held several positions with VISA International including Vice President of Engineering and Program Management for VISA Interactive, VISA International’s Worldwide Remote Banking and Bill Payment Company. As Director at VISA International Electronic Banking, he led the technical relationship with Intuit to facilitate standards in the marketplace through a joint effort with VISA, Intuit, Chase Manhattan Bank and Wells Fargo Bank. Jim received a BS in Business Administration from the University of Montana.
